casebody.data:
AUDITORIUM CONDITIONING CORPORATION, Appellant, v. WARNER BROTHERS PICTURES, Inc., and Warner Brothers Theatres, Inc., Appellees. No. 321. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. April 6, 1936. . Robert B. Knowles, of New York City (Charles J. Staples and Herman Seid, both of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Pennie, Davis, Marvin & Edmonds, of New York City (George E. Middleton and H. Stanley Mansfield, both of New York City, of counsel), for appellees.

Before L. HAND, SWAN, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree (11 F.Supp. 21) affirmed on opinion below.
